post/2005/REBOL Grab Bag Section Added

date

2005-03-17
tags

note/2005

I don’t get it. I keep telling myself that it’s time to write about something else. Maybe Ruby or Perl or even Python. What do I do instead? I create REBOL Grab Bag including a page on writing a simple command-line utility for getting information about the current charge of your notebook computer. What’s up with that?

post/2005/Monitor Your Battery Life with REBOL
